author: Megan Armstrong
title: NFL Foundation Donates $3.4 Million to Help Fight Coronavirus
description: The NFL Foundation has donated $3.4 million to relief efforts for the  COVID -19 pandemic, the league  announced  Thursday...
content:
Ron Schwane/Associated Press
The NFL Foundation has donated $3.4 million to relief efforts for the COVID-19 pandemic, the league announced Thursday.
That donation brought the NFL's donation total, alongside the NFL Players Association, teams, owners and pla… [+661 chars]
